sentence.Network_en: Mr Burns has actively campaigned against a hostel being set up here.
sentence.Network_cn: 伯恩斯先生积极活动，反对在这儿建青年旅舍。

sentence.Network_en: They have never been actively encouraged to take such risks.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们从未被撺掇去冒这样的风险。

sentence.Network_en: In many ways, our society actively promotes alcoholism.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们的社会从多个方面助长了酗酒的风气。

词汇竞赛 - 中国习网 ... Excite 刺激，使兴奋 Active 积极的 Act 行为.

...前预防和全过程控制，不仅使生产现场环境得到保障，而且源源不断地向社会提供环保产品，贡献于人类和地球。, 9、活动(activity), 这里具体指的是生产现场的活动，是生产现场7SEA管理方法的最后一个组成部分，它是三洋制冷开展生产现场.

entry.def: Someone who is active moves around a lot or does a lot of things.

example.ex: Having an active youngster about the house can be quite wearing.
example.tran: 家里有个好动的小孩会是相当累人的。

entry.def: If you have an active mind or imagination, you are always thinking of new things.

example.ex: ...the tragedy of an active mind trapped by failing physical health.
example.tran: 因为健康状况衰退而思维受阻的悲剧

entry.def: If someone is active in an organization, cause, or campaign, they do things for it rather than just giving it their support.

example.ex: ...a chance for fathers to play a more active role in childcare...
example.tran: 让父亲们更积极地参与育婴的机会

example.ex: I am an active member of the Conservative Party...
example.tran: 我是保守党的积极分子。

entry.def: Active is used to emphasize that someone is taking action in order to achieve something, rather than just hoping for it or achieving it in an indirect way.

example.ex: Companies need to take active steps to increase exports.
example.tran: 各公司需要采取积极措施增加出口。

entry.def: If you say that a person or animal is active in a particular place or at a particular time, you mean that they are performing their usual activities or performing a particular activity.

example.ex: Guerrilla groups are active in the province.

entry.def: An active volcano has erupted recently or is expected to erupt quite soon.

entry.tran: 起化学(或生物)作用的;活性的;有效的
entry.def: An active substance has a chemical or biological effect on things.

example.ex: The active ingredient in some of the mouthwashes was simply detergent.
example.tran: 某些漱口剂中的有效成分只不过是洗涤剂而已。

entry.def: In grammar, the active or the active voice means the forms of a verb which are used when the subject refers to a person or thing that does something. For example, in 'I saw her yesterday', the verb is in the active.

auth_sentence.content: Physicians need to be actively involved in our communities.
auth_sentence.res_content: Physicians need to be actively involved in our communities.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Physicians need to be actively involved in our communities.

auth_sentence.content: Indeed, workers from other countries were actively solicited.
auth_sentence.res_content: Indeed, workers from other countries were actively solicited.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Indeed, workers from other countries were actively solicited.

auth_sentence.content: This is a grave indictment of actively managed funds.
auth_sentence.res_content: This is a grave indictment of actively managed funds.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This is a grave indictment of actively managed funds.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,表示"……的",通常在在名词后.; 2. 表副词,放在形容词后,"……地"

stems_affixes.word_buile: come来+ly……的→翩翩而来→美丽动人的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 昂贵的,价值高的,豪华的
stems_affixes.word_buile: cost代价+ly……的→adj.昂贵的,价值高的,豪华的
drizz毛毛雨+ly……的→adj.毛毛雨的[a drizzly day]
friend朋友+ly……的→adj.友好的,友谊的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 很可能的,合适的,可靠的
stems_affixes.word_buile: like像+ly……的→adj.很可能的,合适的,可靠的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 活泼的,活跃的;栩栩如生的,真实的
stems_affixes.word_buile: live活+ly……的→adj.活泼的,活跃的;栩栩如生的,真实的
man男人+ly……的→adj.男子气概的,果断的
niggard小气鬼+ly……的→adj.吝啬的,勉强的
otherworld超世+ly……的→adj.超脱尘世的,超俗的
spindle细长的人[或物]+ly……的→spindly细长的,纤弱的
time时间+ly……的→adj.及时的,适时的
week周+ly……的→adj.每星期的,一周的 adv.每周一次 n.周刊,周报
month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊
continuous连续的+ly……的→adv.不断地,连续地

stems_affixes.value_cn: 幸福地,愉快地,恰当地,幸亏
stems_affixes.word_buile: happy快乐的,幸福的+ly……的→happily幸福地
active积极的+ly……地→adv.活跃地,积极地

according相符的+ly……地→adv.因此,从而
final最后的+ly……地→adv.最后,终于

stems_affixes.value_cn: 实际上,事实上,竟然,居然,如今
stems_affixes.word_buile: actual[adj.实际的, 真实的, 现行的, 目前的]+ly……地→adv.实际上,事实上,竟然,居然,如今
adequate足够的+ly……地→adv.充分地
consequent作为结果的+ly……地→adv.从而,因此
anxious担忧的+ly……地→adv.忧虑地,不安地
biological[adj.生物学的]+ly……地→adv.生物学上
certain肯定的+ly……地→adv.的确,[口语]当然,行
chief主要的+ly……地→adv.首要,主要地
commercial商业的+ly……地→adv.商业上,通商上

stems_affixes.value_cn: 普遍地,通常地,现在,当前
stems_affixes.word_buile: current当前的,流动的+ly……地→adv.普遍地,通常地,现在,当前
decided确定的+ly……地→adv.果断地,断然地
definite明确的+ly……地→adv.一定地,明确地
easy容易的+ly……地→easily容易地
economical节约的,经济的+ly……地→adv.经济地,经济学地
exact强求,精确的+ly……地→adv.正确地,严密地
exceeding非常的+ly……地→adv.极端地,非常
excessive过分的+ly……地→adv.过分地,非常地
extreme极端的+ly……地→adv.极端地,极其,非常
aggressive侵略的+ly……地→adv. 侵略地,攻势地
financial财政的,金融的+ly……地→adv.财政上,金融上
formal正式的;形式的+ly……地→adv.正式地,形式上
fortunate幸运的+ly……地→adv.幸运地
general总的,大体的+ly……地→adv.一般,通常,一般地

great大的+ly……地→adv.大大地,非常
immediate立即的+ly……地→adv.立即,马上,直接地
incidental附带的+ly……地→adv.附带地,顺便提及
increasing渐增的+ly……地→adv.日益,愈加

like像+ly……地→有些像的→很可能
logical逻辑的,符合逻辑的+ly……地→adv.论理上,逻辑上
mental精神的+ly……地→adv.精神上,智力上,在内心
moderate中等的,适度的+ly……地→adv.适度地
natural自然的+ly……地→adv.自然地
necessary必要的+ly……地→necessarily必要地
polite有礼貌的+ly……地→adv.客气地,斯文地,优雅地
positive肯定的,积极的+ly……地→adv.断然地;肯定地
preferable更可取的+ly……地→preferably更适宜
present现在+ly……地→adv.目前,不久
probable可能的+ly……地→probably或许,大概
progressive前进的+ly……地→adv.日益增多地
prompt敏捷的+ly……地→adv.敏捷地,迅速地
relative相对的;相关的+ly……地→adv.相关地
repeated重复的+ly表副词→adv.重复地,再三地

month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊

Sentence.sentence: If you say no, however, it may surprise you to learn that you are only unemployed if you've been actively looking for work in the past four weeks; otherwise, you are "marginally attached to the labor force" and not actually unemployed.
There are three dozen universities in the UK which are actively engaged in advanced research training and commercialisation work.

sentences.en: She was actively looking for a job.
During this period all the students were actively participating.
sentences.cn: 在这节课中所有的学生都积极参加。

sentences.en: Your proposal is being actively considered.
sentences.cn: 你的提议正得到认真考虑。
